title: Zara’s Fall Collection Is Filled With Cozy Staples
description: .disclaimer{width:90%;margin-bottom:1rem}.disclaimer__lines{width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:1px solid #999;padding:0;max-width:150px}.disclaimer__copy{width:100%;max-width:355px;font-family:Brown Regular,sans-serif;font-size:.9rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.3em;color:#333;padding:0 0 .4rem;margin:1rem auto;text-align:center} All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. With new products dropping seemingly every week, it’s no secret that Zara can be tricky to navigate. But with the popular brand’s fall arrivals now on site, we simply can’t have you missing out on any gems. To save you some time — and to point you in the right direction for all your cold-weather must-haves — we scoured Zara’s new arrivals ourselves.  If you’re looking to secure a few staples like an office-approved blazer or a pair of trendy burgundy boots, Zara’s latest drop is packed with loads of fall outfit inspiration. Think: head-turning capes, party-ready dresses, and thick knit jumpers. For a little extra help, use the “you may also like” section at the bottom of every product page, too. Now scroll on and get ready to add to cart. Zara Fall Knitwear Knitwear is always a fall win and Zara’s new arrivals are packed with loads of layerable styles. The collection includes  100% wool knit jackets, cropped jumpers, and embellished cardigans to brighten up dark, wet days. Complete your ‘fit with your favorite pair of jeans and you’ll be ready to go. Zara Fall Dresses From draped midi dresses to office-appropriate LBDs, Zara’s fall dresses do not disappoint. Whether you’re seeking a seasonal pop of color, or sticking to your go-to neutrals, you’ll find plenty of dresses for all fall occasions. Zara Fall Bottoms Never underestimate the power of bold bottoms. Case in point: Zara’s offering of wide-leg trousers, leather midi skirts, and power suits. While you’re at it, why not experiment with new layering styles? Skirts over jeans, anyone? Zara Fall Tops Give your wardrobe a boost with a timeless button-down or draped shirt. Zara’s newest tops range from smart basics like high-neck tees, to demure, statement shirts that’ll elevate any work or party look. Zara Fall Outerwear This collection proves that coats and jackets don’t have to be boring. If we must layer up, why not do it in style with an oversized coat, faux-fur sweatshirt, or suede jacket? Your fall ‘fits will thank you for these ultra-stylish finishing touches.  Zara Fall Accessories Zara always nails its accessory selection, from stylish shoes to statement handbags and jewellery that will satisfy all your magpie cravings. Nab a pair of knee-high boots or get in on the double-belt styling hack from this season’s runways. Like what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?How To Style The Suede Trend For Fall/Winter 2024Revamp Your Closet With New Massimo Dutti CapsuleMadewell’s Fall Arrivals Features Denim & Suede
author: Ebony-Renee Baker
excerpt: If you’re looking to secure a few staples like a lightweight coat or a pair of trendy fall sneakers, Zara’s latest drop is packed with loads of outfit inspiration.

html:
All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.

With new products dropping seemingly every week, it’s no secret that Zara can be tricky to navigate. But with the popular brand’s fall arrivals now on site, we simply can’t have you missing out on any gems. To save you some time — and to point you in the right direction for all your cold-weather must-haves — we scoured Zara’s new arrivals ourselves. 

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

Zara Fall Knitwear

Knitwear is always a fall win and Zara’s new arrivals are packed with loads of layerable styles. The collection includes  100% wool knit jackets, cropped jumpers, and embellished cardigans to brighten up dark, wet days. Complete your 'fit with your favorite pair of jeans and you'll be ready to go.

Zara Fall Dresses

From draped midi dresses to office-appropriate LBDs, Zara’s fall dresses do not disappoint. Whether you're seeking a seasonal pop of color, or sticking to your go-to neutrals, you’ll find plenty of dresses for all fall occasions.

Zara Fall Bottoms

Never underestimate the power of bold bottoms. Case in point: Zara’s offering of wide-leg trousers, leather midi skirts, and power suits. While you're at it, why not experiment with new layering styles? Skirts over jeans, anyone?

Zara Fall Tops

Give your wardrobe a boost with a timeless button-down or draped shirt. Zara's newest tops range from smart basics like high-neck tees, to demure, statement shirts that'll elevate any work or party look.

Zara Fall Outerwear

This collection proves that coats and jackets don’t have to be boring. If we must layer up, why not do it in style with an oversized coat, faux-fur sweatshirt, or suede jacket? Your fall ‘fits will thank you for these ultra-stylish finishing touches. 

Zara Fall Accessories
